channel.title: Cache packing models?
channel.description:
Alright so my client already preloads all my models & it takes forever for my client to start up & get in-to game.
I heard if you cache pack your models it takes up less memory space & will load your client a lot faster.
How do I go about cache packing all my .raw files?
